blocks.subject: A PLEDGE TO JEFF SKILLING
text: The general counsel meeting on Wednesday, May 2nd at the Westin Riverwalk in
San Antonio will start at 9:00am in the Zapata Room on the Ballroom Level.
There will be a one hour break for lunch at noon.  Reservations for the
entire group have been made at the hotel's restaurant.  The meeting will
resume at 1:00pm and continue until finished.
